patthana3.3:9.1: Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:10.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:12.1: Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.3:13.1: Naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ, napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:14.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:16.1: Sappaccayo kusalo dhammo sappaccayassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:17.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:18.1: Sappaccayaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:19.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:24.1: Sappaccayaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:25.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:26.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:28.1: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:29.1: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:30.1: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:31.1: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:32.1: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:33.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, anantare ekaṃ … pe … nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:35.1: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:36.1: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:42.1: Saṅkhataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:49.1: Anidassanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:50.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:55.1: Anidassanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:56.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:61.1: Anidassanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:62.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana3.3:63.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, naāhāre tīṇi … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.3:64.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:66.1: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:67.1: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:68.1: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:69.1: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:70.1: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:70.3: Anidassano abyākato dhammo sanidassanassa abyākatassa ca anidassanassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:71.1: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:72.1: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:73.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi) sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.3:81.1: Appaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:82.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … vippayutte ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:84.1: Appaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:85.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ (pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana3.3:90.1: Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:90.2: Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:90.3: Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato ca appaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … nava.
patthana3.3:91.1: Appaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.3:92.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.3:94.1: Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:99.1: Appaṭigho abyākato dhammo appaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:100.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.
patthana3.3:102.1: Sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo sappaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:106.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.3:110.1: Arūpiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:112.1: Arūpiṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:113.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:115.1: Rūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:116.1: Arūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:117.1: Rūpiṃ abyākatañca arūpiṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:118.1: Rūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.3:119.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.3:120.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … napurejāte nava … pe … nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.3:122.1: Arūpī abyākato dhammo arūpissa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:123.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.3:127.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.3:131.1: Lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.3:132.1: Lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.3:133.1: Lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. #1
patthana3.3:134.1: Lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.3:135.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … kamme dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.3:136.1: Naadhipatiyā dve … pe … naāsevane ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte dve.
patthana3.3:137.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:139.1: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:140.1: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokuttarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:141.1: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:142.1: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:143.1: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:144.1: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokuttarassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:144.3: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.3:145.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve … pe … upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve, kamme dve, āhāre dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.3:147.1: Lokiyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:148.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.3:150.1: Lokiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.3:151.1: Lokuttaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:152.1: Lokiyaṃ abyākatañca lokuttaraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:153.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.3:154.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve … pe … napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca … pe … nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, naāhāre ekaṃ … pe … namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.3:155.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:157.1: Lokiyo abyākato dhammo lokiyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.3:158.1: Lokuttaro abyākato dhammo lokuttarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:159.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.3:160.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.3:164.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:164.2: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:164.3: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo ca kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:165.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.3:168.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.3:169.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme nava, navipāke nava … pe … navippayutte nava.
patthana3.3:170.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:172.1: Kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo kenaci viññeyyassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:173.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava … pe … kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.3:177.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ akusalampi kenaci viññeyyaṃ abyākatampi kenaci viññeyyakusalasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
